meanings.definition: To honor the memory of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The family commemorates their grandfather by visiting his grave every year.
meanings.sent2: The town commemorates its founding with an annual parade.
meanings.sent3: The cat commemorates its favorite toy by carrying it around the house.
meanings.sent4: The painting commemorates the beauty of the sunset in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The monument commemorates the bravery of the soldiers who fought for their country.

meanings.definition: To celebrate or observe an event or occasion by remembering it.
meanings.sent1: The school commemorates its anniversary with a special assembly.
meanings.sent2: The nation commemorates Independence Day with fireworks and picnics.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel commemorates the end of winter by gathering nuts for the season.
meanings.sent4: The song commemorates the joy of friendship with its uplifting melody.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit commemorates the history of the local community through artifacts.
